languages.text: "Ты прав. Пожалуй, Соломон еще может быть мне полезен — надо его вернуть".
"You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав. Пожалуй, Соломон еще может быть мне полезен — надо его вернуть".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Solomorne may be useful to me yet. I should bring him back."
"You are right. Solomorne may be useful to me yet. I should bring him back."
"You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."
"You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."
"You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."
"You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

languages.text: 「君の言うとおりだ。ソロモーンはまだ役に立つかもしれない。迎えに行くべきだな」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: 「君の言うとおりだ。ソロモーンはまだ役に立つかもしれない。迎えに行くべきだな」

languages.text: "Haklısın. Solomorne'un bana hâlâ faydası dokunabilir. Onu geri getirmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Solomorne'un bana hâlâ faydası dokunabilir. Onu geri getirmeliyim."

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Solomorne todavía podría serme útil. Debería rescatarlo».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Solomorne todavía podría serme útil. Debería rescatarlo».

languages.text: “你说得对。索罗蒙说不定还能派上用场，我应该把他带回来。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: “你说得对。索罗蒙说不定还能派上用场，我应该把他带回来。”

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Solomorne peut encore m'être utile. Je devrais sans doute aller le récupérer. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Solomorne peut encore m'être utile. Je devrais sans doute aller le récupérer. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Solomorne könnte sich noch als nützlich erweisen. Ich sollte ihn zurückholen."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Solomorne may prove useful to me yet. I should retrieve him."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Solomorne könnte sich noch als nützlich erweisen. Ich sollte ihn zurückholen."
